Package org.apache.calcite.tools

Interface RelBuilderFactory

public interface RelBuilderFactory
A partially-created RelBuilder.

Add a cluster, and optionally a schema, when you want to create a builder.

A ProtoRelBuilder can be shared among queries, and thus can be inside a RelOptRule. It is a nice way to encapsulate the policy that this particular rule instance should create DrillFilter and DrillProject versus HiveFilter and HiveProject.

See Also:
RelFactories.LOGICAL_BUILDER

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    RelBuilder create​(RelOptCluster cluster, RelOptSchema schema)
    Creates a RelBuilder.
